name: portfolio-website
description: Hello, my name is Jan Inggao. This portfolio consists of 4 pages. My home page contains some snippets of some of my projects. An about section which tells lets you know more about myself. A blog page containing some blogs. and a contact page where you can contact me.

scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist/css && touch dist/css/style.css && cat src/css/*.css >> dist/css/style.css

author: Jan Inggao
